meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I peed on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The dog peed on the fire hydrant.
meanings.sent3: The cat peed in the sandbox, thinking it was a giant litter box.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet peed water all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent5: The little boy peed in the pool, creating a yellow swirl around him.

meanings.sent1: After holding it in for so long, she finally peed in relief.
meanings.sent2: The baby peed in his diaper during the car ride.
meanings.sent3: The tree must have peed a lot to make the ground so wet around it.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing toilet peed water onto the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent5: The old dog peed on the rug, leaving a distinct smell behind.
